verses.verse: In the first <WH259> year <WH8141> of Darius <WH1867> the son <WH1121> of Achashverosh <WH325>, of the seed <WH2233> of the Medes <WH4074>, which was made king <WH4427> <WH8717> over the realm <WH4438> of the Chaldeans <WH3778>;

In the first <WH259> year <WH8141> of his reign <WH4427> <WH8800> I Daniel <WH1840> understood <WH995> <WH8804> by books <WH5612> the number <WH4557> of the years <WH8141>, whereof the word <WH1697> of the YY <WH3068> came to Yirmeyah-yahu <WH3414> the prophet <WH5030>, that he would accomplish <WH4390> <WH8763> seventy <WH7657> years <WH8141> in the desolations <WH2723> of Yerushalayim <WH3389>.

And I set <WH5414> <WH8799> my face <WH6440> unto the YY <WH136> 'Elohim <WH430>, to seek <WH1245> <WH8763> by prayer <WH8605> and supplications <WH8469>, with fasting <WH6685>, and sackcloth <WH8242>, and ashes <WH665>:

And I prayed <WH6419> <WH8691> unto the YY <WH3068> my 'Elohim <WH430>, and made my confession <WH3034> <WH8691>, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, O <WH577> YY <WH136>, the great <WH1419> and dreadful <WH3372> <WH8737> 'Elohim <WH410>, keeping <WH8104> <WH8802> the covenant <WH1285> and mercy <WH2617> to them that love <WH157> <WH8802> him, and to them that keep <WH8104> <WH8802> his Mitzvot <WH4687>;

We have sinned <WH2398> <WH8804>, and have committed iniquity <WH5753> <WH8804>, and have done wickedly <WH7561> <WH8689>, and have rebelled <WH4775> <WH8804>, even by departing <WH5493> <WH8800> from thy precepts <WH4687> and from thy judgments <WH4941>:

Neither have we hearkened <WH8085> <WH8804> unto thy servants <WH5650> the prophets <WH5030>, which spake <WH1696> <WH8765> in thy name <WH8034> to our kings <WH4428>, our princes <WH8269>, and our fathers <WH1>, and to all the people <WH5971> of the land <WH776>.

O YY <WH136>, righteousness <WH6666> belongeth unto thee, but unto us confusion <WH1322> of faces <WH6440>, as at this day <WH3117>; to the men <WH376> of Y'hudah <WH3063>, and to the inhabitants <WH3427> <WH8802> of Yerushalayim <WH3389>, and unto all Yisra'EL <WH3478>, that are near <WH7138>, and that are far off <WH7350>, through all the countries <WH776> whither thou hast driven <WH5080> <WH8689> them, because of their trespass <WH4604> that they have trespassed <WH4603> <WH8804> against thee.
O YY <WH136>, to us belongeth confusion <WH1322> of face <WH6440>, to our kings <WH4428>, to our princes <WH8269>, and to our fathers <WH1>, because we have sinned <WH2398> <WH8804> against thee.
To the YY <WH136> our 'Elohim <WH430> belong mercies <WH7356> and forgivenesses <WH5547>, though we have rebelled <WH4775> <WH8804> against him;

Neither have we obeyed <WH8085> <WH8804> the voice <WH6963> of the YY <WH3068> our 'Elohim <WH430>, to walk <WH3212> <WH8800> in his Torahs <WH8451>, which he set <WH5414> <WH8804> before <WH6440> us by <WH3027> his servants <WH5650> the prophets <WH5030>.

Yea, all Yisra'EL <WH3478> have transgressed <WH5674> <WH8804> thy Torah <WH8451>, even by departing <WH5493> <WH8800>, that they might not obey <WH8085> <WH8800> thy voice <WH6963>; therefore the curse <WH423> is poured <WH5413> <WH8799> upon us, and the oath <WH7621> that is written <WH3789> <WH8803> in the Torah <WH8451> of Mosheh <WH4872> the servant <WH5650> of 'Elohim <WH430>, because we have sinned <WH2398> <WH8804> against him.

And he hath confirmed <WH6965> <WH8686> his words <WH1697>, which he spake <WH1696> <WH8765> against us, and against our judges <WH8199> <WH8802> that judged <WH8199> <WH8804> us, by bringing <WH935> <WH8687> upon us a great <WH1419> evil <WH7451>: for under the whole heaven <WH8064> hath not been done <WH6213> <WH8738> as hath been done <WH6213> <WH8738> upon Yerushalayim <WH3389>.

As it is written <WH3789> <WH8803> in the Torah <WH8451> of Mosheh <WH4872>, all this evil <WH7451> is come <WH935> <WH8804> upon us: yet made we not our prayer <WH2470> <WH8765> before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068> our 'Elohim <WH430>, that we might turn <WH7725> <WH8800> from our iniquities <WH5771>, and understand <WH7919> <WH8687> thy truth <WH571>.

Therefore hath the YY <WH3068> watched <WH8245> <WH8799> upon the evil <WH7451>, and brought <WH935> <WH8686> it upon us: for the YY <WH3068> our 'Elohim <WH430> is righteous <WH6662> in all his works <WH4639> which he doeth <WH6213> <WH8804>: for we obeyed <WH8085> <WH8804> not his voice <WH6963>.

And now, O YY <WH136> our 'Elohim <WH430>, that hast brought <WH3318> thy people <WH5971> forth <WH3318> <WH8689> out of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> with a mighty <WH2389> hand <WH3027>, and hast gotten <WH6213> <WH8799> thee renown <WH8034>, as at this day <WH3117>; we have sinned <WH2398> <WH8804>, we have done wickedly <WH7561> <WH8804>.

O YY <WH136>, according to all thy righteousness <WH6666>, I beseech thee, let thine anger <WH639> and thy fury <WH2534> be turned away <WH7725> <WH8799> from thy city <WH5892> Yerushalayim <WH3389>, thy holy <WH6944> mountain <WH2022>: because for our sins <WH2399>, and for the iniquities <WH5771> of our fathers <WH1>, Yerushalayim <WH3389> and thy people <WH5971> are become a reproach <WH2781> to all that are about <WH5439> us.

Now therefore, O our 'Elohim <WH430>, hear <WH8085> <WH8798> the prayer <WH8605> of thy servant <WH5650>, and his supplications <WH8469>, and cause thy face <WH6440> to shine <WH215> <WH8685> upon thy sanctuary <WH4720> that is desolate <WH8076>, for the YY's <WH136> sake.

O my 'Elohim <WH430>, incline <WH5186> <WH8685> thine ear <WH241>, and hear <WH8085> <WH8798>; open <WH6491> <WH8798> thine eyes <WH5869>, and behold <WH7200> <WH8798> our desolations <WH8074> <WH8802>, and the city <WH5892> which is called <WH7121> <WH8738> by thy name <WH8034>: for we do not present <WH5307> <WH8688> our supplications <WH8469> before <WH6440> thee for our righteousnesses <WH6666>, but for thy great <WH7227> mercies <WH7356>.

O YY <WH136>, hear <WH8085> <WH8798>; O YY <WH136>, forgive <WH5545> <WH8798>; O YY <WH136>, hearken <WH7181> <WH8685> and do <WH6213> <WH8798>; defer <WH309> <WH8762> not <WH408>, for thine own sake, O my 'Elohim <WH430>: for thy city <WH5892> and thy people <WH5971> are called <WH7121> <WH8738> by thy name <WH8034>.

And whiles I was speaking <WH1696> <WH8764>, and davvening <WH6419> <WH8693>, and confessing <WH3034> <WH8693> my sin <WH2403> and the sin <WH2403> of my people <WH5971> Yisra'EL <WH3478>, and presenting <WH5307> <WH8688> my supplication <WH8467> before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068> my 'Elohim <WH430> for the holy <WH6944> mountain <WH2022> of my 'Elohim <WH430>;

Yea, whiles I was speaking <WH1696> <WH8764> in prayer <WH8605>, even the man <WH376> Gavri'el <WH1403>, whom I had seen <WH7200> <WH8804> in the vision <WH2377> at the beginning <WH8462>, being caused to fly <WH3286> <WH8716> swiftly <WH3288>, touched <WH5060> <WH8802> me about the time <WH6256> of the evening <WH6153> oblation <WH4503>.

And he informed <WH995> <WH8799> me, and talked <WH1696> <WH8762> with me, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, O Daniel <WH1840>, I am now come forth <WH3318> <WH8804> to give thee skill <WH7919> <WH8687> and understanding <WH998>.

At the beginning <WH8462> of thy supplications <WH8469> the Mitzvah <WH1697> came forth <WH3318> <WH8804>, and I am come <WH935> <WH8804> to shew <WH5046> <WH8687> thee; for thou art greatly beloved <WH2532>: therefore understand <WH995> <WH8798> the matter <WH1697>, and consider <WH995> <WH8685> the vision <WH4758>.

Seventy <WH7657> weeks <WH7620> are determined <WH2852> <WH8738> upon thy people <WH5971> and upon thy holy <WH6944> city <WH5892>, to finish <WH3607> <WH8763> the transgression <WH6588>, and to make an end <WH8552> <WH8687> <WH8675> <WH2856> <WH8800> of sins <WH2403>, and to make reconciliation <WH3722> <WH8763> for iniquity <WH5771>, and to bring in <WH935> <WH8687> everlasting <WH5769> righteousness <WH6664>, and to seal up <WH2856> <WH8800> the vision <WH2377> and prophecy <WH5030>, and to anoint <WH4886> <WH8800> the most <WH6944> Holy <WH6944>.

Know <WH3045> <WH8799> therefore and understand <WH7919> <WH8686>, that from the going forth <WH4161> of the Mitzvah <WH1697> to restore <WH7725> <WH8687> and to build <WH1129> <WH8800> Yerushalayim <WH3389> unto the Messiah <WH4899> the Prince <WH5057> shall be seven <WH7651> weeks <WH7620>, and threescore <WH8346> and two <WH8147> weeks <WH7620>: the street <WH7339> shall be built <WH1129> <WH8738> again <WH7725> <WH8799>, and the wall <WH2742>, even in troublous <WH6695> times <WH6256>.

And after <WH310> threescore <WH8346> and two <WH8147> weeks <WH7620> shall Messiah <WH4899> be cut off <WH3772> <WH8735>, but not for himself: and the people <WH5971> of the prince <WH5057> that shall come <WH935> <WH8802> shall destroy <WH7843> <WH8686> the city <WH5892> and the sanctuary <WH6944>; and the end <WH7093> thereof shall be with a flood <WH7858>, and unto the end <WH7093> of the war <WH4421> desolations <WH8074> <WH8802> are determined <WH2782> <WH8737>.

And he shall confirm <WH1396> <WH8689> the covenant <WH1285> with many <WH7227> for one <WH259> week <WH7620>: and in the midst <WH2677> of the week <WH7620> he shall cause the sacrifice <WH2077> and the oblation <WH4503> to cease <WH7673> <WH8686>, and for the overspreading <WH3671> of abominations <WH8251> he shall make it desolate <WH8074> <WH8789>, even until the consummation <WH3617>, and that determined <WH2782> <WH8737> shall be poured <WH5413> <WH8799> upon the desolate <WH8074> <WH8802>.
